keywords.name: Execute Manual Step
keywords.shortdoc: Pauses test execution until user sets the keyword status.

keywords.name: Get Selection From User
keywords.shortdoc: Pauses test execution and asks user to select a value.

keywords.name: Get Value From User
keywords.shortdoc: Pauses test execution and asks user to input a value.

keywords.args: message=Test execution paused. Press OK to continue.
keywords.name: Pause Execution
keywords.shortdoc: Pauses test execution until user clicks `Ok` button.
